articles.title: ‘Racism’: Qataris decry French cartoon of national football team
articles.description: Caricature published by Le Canard enchainé in its October issue which focuses on Qatar and its role as World Cup host.
articles.content:
A cartoon by a French newspaper depicting Qatari footballers as terrorists has sparked outrage on social media, with users calling out its blatant Islamophobia and racism.

articles.title: Vanderbilt football assistant takes 'step back' after pro-Ye post
articles.description: Vanderbilt AD Candice Lee said defensive backs coach Dan Jackson will "step back" from his job while the school continues a review of his recent comment on social media defending the rapper formerly known as Kanye West.
